createAgent.guidelinesRule1: Do not create Agent characters containing adult, sexually explicit, violent, hateful, or discriminatory elements.
createAgent.guidelinesRule2: Do not design Agent interactions that involve fraud, harassment, or the spread of false information.
createAgent.guidelinesRule3: Respect the intellectual property and portrait rights of others. Use only original or properly licensed materials.
createAgent.guidelinesWarning: Violations will result in content removal and may lead to account restrictions, withholding of earnings, or permanent suspension.

deleteAction.title: Delete Action
deleteAction.intro: Delete the action content from the slot while keeping the slot itself. You can reconfigure the action for this slot after deletion.
deleteAction.rule1Desc: This operation only deletes the action configuration in the slot, not the slot itself
deleteAction.rule2Desc: After deletion, the slot remains locked and can continue to be used
deleteAction.rule3Desc: After deletion, you can configure new preset actions or custom actions for this slot
deleteAction.warning: Note: Deleted actions cannot be recovered. Please confirm if you want to continue. Deletion fee is applicable to all agent levels.
deleteAction.featureInDevelopmentDesc: The delete action feature is currently under development. Stay tuned...

standIdle.name: Stand Idle
standIdle.desc: Digital human standing video with slight breathing, blinking, occasional head turns, natural relaxed posture, calm expression

waveHello.name: Wave Hello
waveHello.desc: Digital human raising right hand to wave hello, smiling, natural motion, starting from standing, waving twice, returning to natural stance

nodYes.name: Nod Yes
nodYes.desc: Digital human nodding video, body slightly leaning forward, gently nodding two or three times, natural friendly expression

welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.desc: Digital human gently opening both arms with a welcoming smile

relaxPose.name: Relax Pose
relaxPose.desc: Digital human hands behind back, gently swaying left and right, showing relaxation

hairFix.name: Hair Fix
hairFix.desc: Digital human using right hand to lightly brush forehead or side hair

pray.name: Pray
pray.desc: Digital human hands clasped together, slightly bowing head for one second

pause.name: Pause
pause.desc: Digital human crossing hands in T-shape, making a pause gesture

cute.name: Cute
cute.desc: Digital human hands cupping both sides of chin, slightly shaking head

shakeNo.name: Shake No
shakeNo.desc: Digital human shaking head left and right, with a relaxed smile, gentle motion, returning to natural stance

think.name: Think
think.desc: Digital human thinking gesture, right hand lightly touching chin, slightly raising head, thoughtful gaze, returning to natural stance after 2-3 seconds

clap.name: Clap
clap.desc: Digital human clapping video, smiling, clapping hands three or four times with slight body motion, natural movement

reminder.name: Reminder
reminder.desc: Digital human right index finger lightly tapping left palm twice, as if emphasizing a point

softHold.name: Soft Hold
softHold.desc: Digital human hands gently placed at chest level, as if holding air

confident.name: Confident
confident.desc: Digital human fingers sliding from chin to side face, showing confidence

comeHere.name: Come Here
comeHere.desc: Digital human right hand beckoning towards self twice

shy.name: Shy
shy.desc: Digital human right hand placed on back of neck, lightly scratching once

circle.name: Circle
circle.desc: Digital human drawing a small circle with hands at chest level

heartLike.name: Heart/Like
heartLike.desc: Digital human interactive gesture, making heart shape with hands or thumbs up, smiling, lowering hands to natural stance after gesture

dance.name: Dance
dance.desc: Digital human light dancing video, performing dance moves, moderate body motion, with smile, naturally returning to standing

turnBack.name: Turn Back
turnBack.desc: Digital human turning motion, body half-turned, looking back at camera with slight smile, then naturally returning

ease.name: Ease
ease.desc: Digital human gently pushing forward with both hands twice, soft and soothing

wakeUp.name: Wake Up
wakeUp.desc: Digital human right hand lightly patting side of face, showing energizing motion

salute.name: Salute
salute.desc: Digital human right hand raised to chest level, slightly nodding to salute

proud.name: Proud
proud.desc: Digital human slightly raising chin and smiling, showing confidence

note.name: Note
note.desc: Digital human using finger to lightly tap side of head once, indicating remembering

thumbBack.name: Thumb Back
thumbBack.desc: Digital human right hand thumb pointing backward

laugh.name: Laugh
laugh.desc: Digital human laughing video, natural motion with slight body sway, returning to natural stance after 1-2 seconds

continue.name: Continue
continue.desc: Digital human lightly raising right hand and waving forward once, encouraging expression, inviting the other to continue speaking

recall.name: Recall
recall.desc: Digital human right hand on forehead, showing sudden realization expression

calm.name: Calm
calm.desc: Digital human right hand palm pushing forward once, showing calming, no rush expression

coverSmile.name: Cover Smile
coverSmile.desc: Digital human right hand lightly covering mouth corner, showing suppressed laughter

leanIn.name: Lean In
leanIn.desc: Digital human body leaning forward slightly, with curious gaze

selfBoost.name: Self Boost
selfBoost.desc: Digital human hands lightly patting own left and right shoulders, like self-encouragement

me.name: Me
me.desc: Digital human right hand pointing to own chest, conveying it's me

sorry.name: Sorry
sorry.desc: Digital human right hand back of hand lightly touching chest, slightly bowing head in apology

sideStep.name: Side Step
sideStep.desc: Digital human body stepping half-step to one side then returning to origin

relief.name: Relief
relief.desc: Digital human right hand on chest lightly patting once, showing relaxed smile

listen.name: Listen
listen.desc: Digital human right palm placed near ear, head slightly tilted, showing focused listening

pointUp.name: Point Up
pointUp.desc: Digital human right index finger lightly pointing upward once, like a reminder

tease.name: Tease
tease.desc: Digital human fingertip lightly touching mouth corner showing mischievous smile

celebrate.name: Celebrate
celebrate.desc: Digital human right hand forming a fist and lightly swinging at chest level, showing celebration

softReject.name: Soft Reject
softReject.desc: Digital human right hand lightly sweeping in front of chest, gentle refusal

fistGreet.name: Fist Greet
fistGreet.desc: Digital human hands clasped in fist at chest level, slightly nodding in salute

neat.name: Neat
neat.desc: Digital human looking down and lightly patting or arranging clothing

notFound.hint: If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Floa Global Community Content and Conduct Guidelines

article1.title: Article 1: Fundamental Principles
article1.content: Floa is committed to building a safe, innovative, and mutually respectful global Digital Human ecosystem. Every user is expected to adhere to these guidelines to jointly maintain the healthy development of the community. You are solely responsible for all content you create, train, and interact with, as well as your associated conduct on the platform.

article2.title: Article 2: Specific Standards
article2.intro: To clarify community expectations, the following specifies prohibited content and behavior:

section1.title: 2.1 Digital Human Character Standards
section1.intro: The Digital Human characters you create must not include the following elements:

adultContent.title: Adult Content
adultContent.desc: Any form of nudity, sexual suggestiveness, or pornographic depiction.

violence.title: Violence and Harm
violence.desc: Content that promotes or glorifies violent attacks, self-harm, gory scenes, or terrorism.

hate.title: Hate and Discrimination
hate.desc: Insulting, derogatory, or discriminatory features based on race, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, religion, disability, or region.

ipInfringement.title: Intellectual Property Infringement
ipInfringement.desc: Unauthorized copying, imitation, or adaptation of copyrighted works, such as well-known film, television, anime, game characters, or others' original designs.

personalRights.title: Personal Rights Infringement
personalRights.desc: Unauthorized use of another individual's real portrait, name, or other identifiable personal information.

section2.title: 2.2 Interactive Function and Content Standards
section2.intro: The attributes you set for your Digital Human and its interactive behavior must not involve:

illegalActivities.title: Illegal or Harmful Activities
illegalActivities.desc: Inducing, simulating, or facilitating hazardous behaviors such as gambling, drug use, fraud, or weapons trading.

falseInfo.title: False Information
falseInfo.desc: Deliberately generating or spreading rumors, fake news, or maliciously defaming others or organizations.

harassment.title: Harassment and Attacks
harassment.desc: Use of abusive, threatening, intimidating, or other forms of offensive language in interactions.

article3.title: Article 3: Violation Handling Mechanism
article3.intro: To ensure fair enforcement of these guidelines, the platform will implement tiered actions based on the nature, impact, and history of the violation.

warning.title: Content Correction & Warning
warning.desc: For first-time, minor violations. The platform will remove the violating content and issue a warning to the account, which may be accompanied by short-term functional restrictions (e.g., inability to create new Digital Humans for 24-72 hours).

restriction.title: Account Restriction
restriction.desc: For repeated minor violations or more severe cases. The platform will delete violating content and freeze the involved account. During the freeze, all account functions will be disabled, and any associated unredeemed earnings will be forfeited.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.desc: For severe violations, malicious acts, or repeated non-compliance. The platform reserves the right to permanently terminate the violating account's access, reset all earnings to zero, and impose restrictions on linked digital assets.

section2.title: 3.2 Review and Appeal
section2.content: The platform employs a combination of automated systems and manual review for content moderation. If you disagree with an enforcement decision, you may submit an appeal through the official customer support channel. We will conduct a review and inform you of the final outcome.
